product_name: REI Timber Mountain Printed Jacket - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The water-resistant REI Timber Mountain jacket helps your toddler girl stay dry and warm while playing outdoors. Durably constructed with a windproof and water-resistant coated nylon shell and soft, warm polyester fleece lining. 3-panel hood with an extended bill and elastic on the sides keeps snow and rain out; rip-and-stick tab adjusts volume. The Timber Mountain jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets.
short_description: The water-resistant REI Timber Mountain jacket helps your toddler girl stay dry and warm while playing outdoors.
